title: Did CNN publish contradictory articles on hydrochloroquine?
subtitle: The information on HCFCs as a treatment for COVID-19, published in two CNN articles, was not contradictory or inaccurate - despite attempts to make them appear this way.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The graph shows contradictory articles from CNN on hydrochloroquine, published three months away and co-authored by the same person.
